Subject: SharePoint Online Reporting
Description: We categorize our SharePoint scans into four site collection groups: Communication, Teams, Personal, and Others. The reports within the console categorize the data collected from scans by SharePoint, Teams, and OneDrive. Is there a way to edit/create reports that show data reflecting how we categorize our sites? We'd also like show the total percentage breakdown of sensitive data by site collection.
What_We_Know__c:
this will require custom reporting
I recommended ProServe but AM wants to see if SE can build the report first
looks like they scheduled a meeting but I haven't gotten any updates

client says they were contacted by another engineer who was able to help
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
Question:
 Is there a way to edit/create reports that show data reflecting how we categorize our sites? We'd also like show the total percentage breakdown of sensitive data by site collection.


Resolution
This level of report customization is possible but outside the scope of Technical Support. This should be handled by Pro-Serv.
